thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 12 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Fitch Says Japanese Mega Banks Set To Build More Capital‍​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Fitch Says Japanese Mega Banks Set To Build More Capital‍​
text:
Feb 11 (Reuters) -
* FITCH: JAPANESE MEGA BANKS SET TO BUILD MORE CAPITAL‍​ * FITCH-EXPECT STEADY LOAN GROWTH FOR JAPANESE MEGA BANKS, METRIC IN WHICH THEY OUTPERFORMED THEIR GLOBAL PEERS, DRIVEN BY THEIR OVERSEAS EXPANSION
* FITCH-BELIEVE JAPANESE MEGA BANKS’ ASSET QUALITY WILL REMAIN HEALTHY, GIVEN LOW BANKRUPTCIES AND UNEMPLOYMENT, AND FAVOURABLE CORPORATE PROFITABILITY Source text for Eikon:
